nodes.text: Dorn Tlo was a famous Kel Dor Baran Do Sage Master who contacted the New Jedi Order in 30 ABY and sent them old Republic era records from the Jedi to attest to the Baran Do's long history. He would later speak of the Baran Do's belief that the Dark side of the Force was a necessary evil and that following the Potentium's views could be dangerous for the Order and the galaxy.
Dorn Tlo was a Kel Dor for Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Roleplaying Game.
